author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 39-year-old man was arrested by the police for kidnapping a six-year-old school boy here on March 14. However, the boy is yet to be rescued. Deepika’s son Logith, a Class I student, of Samudhiram Palayam, was on his way to school in a van driven by Palanisamy.

While nearing Pokampalayam village, a gang intercepted the van and kidnapped Logith. Palanisamy lodged a complaint with Tiruchengode Rural police.

Inquiries revealed that the boy was kidnapped over family dispute.

The police filed a case against Kanniyappan (65), his wife Nirmala Devi (60) and their son Mahendran.
title: Man held for kidnapping boy
